# browser-switch
Set it as the default browser for Windows and automatically choose other browsers to open links based on rules.

## Usage

Download the latest release from the release page.

1. Change Windows Registry
2. Restart the explorer.exe process
```
taskkill /f /im explorer.exe & start explorer.exe
```
3. Relogin
4. Change the default browser to browser-switch 

## Icon

[icon setting url](https://icon.vwh.sh/?)
